team.Name: Ashwin
team.Title: COO
team.desc: A proven leader in product strategy and solution engineering, Ashwin delivers high-value, scalable results across competitive markets. He excels at driving innovative SaaS solutions, aligning product vision with market needs, and fostering cross-functional collaboration. Known for creating customer-centric solutions that drive measurable business impact while maintaining operational efficiency.

team.Name: Vevek
team.Title: CEO
team.desc: Vevek is a visionary in human performance measurement, with a passion for developing cutting-edge solutions that assess and unlock human potential. Vevek has consistently driven innovation in the field, creating scalable and impactful tools that measure performance across various age groups. Dedicated to becoming the best human capabilities, Vevek strives to deliver high-value results in the realm of human potential.
